Content:: Gilbert is an unincorporated community in Monroe County, Pennsylvania, United States. The population was 459 in the 2000 census.[1] The Pohopoco Creek runs southward through Gilbert, then westward through Beltzville Lake to the Lehigh River. Students in the village attend the Pleasant Valley School District.
